data.text: Look at the word on your screen. Which country is it related to? Click the correct dock.
data.option: Talal shared his lunch with Bilal who had forgotten his own.
Vijay helped his teacher to carry a stack of books.
Fatima told her mother that she could not help her in the kitchen because she was playing a game.
Arif was upset with his brother and pushed him.
Rita, a girl found a stray kitten that had lost its mother. She gave it some milk.
Maha invited all the girls in her class to her birthday, except one girl.
data.question: Pharoah
Trojan horse
Olympic games
Qin Shi Huang
Silk Road
Tutankhamun
River Nile
Pyramids of Giza
Zeus
River Yangtze
mummy
data.feedback: That's good! Now try this one!
I'm sure you'll do better next time!
